long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
Efficiency in Message Management!
Quickly clear out archived messages or restore them as needed, saving you time on LinkedIn.
Boost Productivity!
With easy access to clean up and unarchive, you can better organize your LinkedIn inbox, keeping important conversations at hand.
User-Friendly Interface!
Simple and intuitive design makes deleting or unarchiving archived messages accessible in just a few clicks.
Stay Focused on What Matters!
Eliminate clutter by removing old conversations, so you can stay focused on current opportunities

How It Works:
1. Add the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. The extension operates in English.
3. Click on the extension icon.
4. Press the "Go to LinkedIn page" button, if LinkedIn is not open.
5. Then Click button (click to open archived messages)
6. Click on either Delete All archived Messages or unarchive all Messages as needed; you can also choose to Stop at any time.

Note: This extension is not officially authorized by LinkedIn
